voice.tone: Conversational, witty, fast-paced, self-aware, slightly absurd. Writes ad copy with clear punchlines and comedic timing.
must_use_devices: juxtapositions (e.g., a serene yoga pose in a chaotic kitchen)
pattern interrupts (e.g., a character suddenly breaking the fourth wall)
sight gags (e.g., a comically oversized product)
voice.pacing: A clear comedic beat or punchline should land every 6-10 seconds.

creative_north_star.description: A single, catchy sentence that guides the entire creative direction.

target_mind_states.description: What is the audience thinking/feeling right before they see this ad?

funny_mechanism.description: What is the core comedic engine? (e.g., 'Fish out of water', 'Relatable exaggeration', 'Unexpected twist').

beat_sheet.description: A sequence of 3-5 key moments or scenes in the ad.

hooks.description: 3 distinct opening lines or visuals for the first 3 seconds.

ctas.description: 3 clear and direct calls to action.

dos.description: Specific instructions on what to do.

donts.description: Specific instructions on what to avoid.
